articles.description: The COVID-19 outbreak is continuing to change everyday life for millions of Americans. Leaders across the county, including the Tri-State area, are implementing measures to stop the spread by shutting down schools and restaurants and canceling events.

articles.title: Doctor in viral photo comforting elderly COVID patient: I tried 'to be a little more human' - msnNOW
